TAPI_DSP - DTMF Detection

Detailed Description

The DTMF Detection Interface.

DTMF_DET

Dual-tone multi-frequency (DTMF) is a signal used in telecommunication.
There are 12 DTMF signals and each of these is made up of two tones. According to the frequency, the tones forming the DTMF signal can be classified into two groups.

Table 4. The DTMF keypad frequencies

1209 Hz 1336 Hz 1477 Hz
697 Hz 1 2 3
770 Hz 4 5 6
852 Hz 7 8 9
941 Hz * 0 #

Function Documentation

int32 rtk_SetDtmfCfg ( uint32  chid,
int32  bEnable,
uint32  dir 
)

Enable/Disable DTMF detection.

The detection examines the energy of one of the two tones from an incoming signal at eight different DTMF frequencies to determine which DTMF frequency is present.
Since maximum energy corresponds to DTMF frequency, this procedure enables us to detect the DTMF frequency.

Parameters
chidThe channel number
bEnable0: Disable
1: Enable
dirDTMF detection direction
0: TDM
1: IP
Return values
0Success
Examples:
dtmf_det_cfg.c.
int32 rtk_SetDtmfDetParam ( uint32  chid,
uint32  dir,
int32  threshold,
uint32  on_time_10ms,
uint32  fore_twist,
uint32  rev_twist 
)

Set DTMF detection parameters.

This TAPI can not enable/disable DTMF det. freq. offset support. You can set it by calling rtk_SetDtmfDetParamUpdate().

Parameters
chidThe channel number
dirDTMF detection direction
0: TDM
1: IP
thresholdDTMF detection threshold
Available range: 0 to 40 ( 0 ~ -40 dBm)
Unit: dBm
on_time_10msDTMF detection minimum on time, on_time_10ms.
Unit: 10ms
fore_twistDTMF detection acceptable fore-twist threshold (unit: dB, for twist is positive value) Available range: 1 to 12
Unit: dB
rev_twistDTMF detection acceptable rev-twist threshold (unit: dB, for twist is negative value) Available range: 1 to 12
Unit: dB
Return values
0Success
See Also
rtk_SetDtmfDetParamUpdate
Examples:
dtmf_det_cfg.c.
int32 rtk_SetDtmfDetParamUpdate ( TstDtmfDetPara *  stDtmfDetPara)

Set DTMF detection parameters.

Invoke rtk_SetDtmfDetParamUpdate(), you can select which parameter(s) that you want to change/update. For not update filed(s), you can ignore it(them).

Parameters
stDtmfDetParaThe DTMF detection parameters
Return values
0Success
See Also
rtk_SetDtmfDetParam
Examples:
dtmf_det_cfg.c.
